body: Hello! My 3 year anniversary on Avicus was in March, but I missed it, so let's do an AMA now! Ask away :)
body_tagged: Hello! My 3 year anniversary on Avicus was in March, but I missed it, so let's do an AMA now! Ask away :)
title: 3 Year AMA!!!

replies.body:
Opinions?
What do you like most about Avicus?

<3

replies.body:
Congrats! 

Opinions? 

Do you enjoy being mod?

One thing you wish you could change about the staff team?

One thing you wish you could change in general?

Nice to see you again! :)

replies.body:
{tag=bff56e079469477281be84fc627ea113} You're a pretty great dude who does great as staff! I love Avicus' community.

{tag=60847d9c40424346980db5c38bbec790} Pasta. Spartemex = Spartans (My Fav Sports team at the time) + Timex (The watch I was wearing). You seem like a cool dude, but I can't say I love you. <3

{tag=075b5514293a4bd5bcef367e687d3556} You're a great guy who loves Avicus! Sauce, Sausage, Onion.

{tag=a9f11454beac4cc3a1381780802c8794} My friend introduced my to Avicus for a real quick thing. You're one of the most organized and optimistic seniors!

{tag=f876b8631ccd4ae2acad8a09e2209e81} You definitely contribute quite a lot to Avicus! Cookie Dough.

{tag=fbd4b4d461864581b408666bb8a12df4} New Girl. I'm pretty good at Trombone, I run track, I'm crewhead of my school's theatre's sound crew, I like a lot of stuff :P
replies.body_tagged:
Camemes You're a pretty great dude who does great as staff! I love Avicus' community.

OVanGogh Pasta. Spartemex = Spartans (My Fav Sports team at the time) + Timex (The watch I was wearing). You seem like a cool dude, but I can't say I love you. <3

KojaCola You're a great guy who loves Avicus! Sauce, Sausage, Onion.

Crazy_ My friend introduced my to Avicus for a real quick thing. You're one of the most organized and optimistic seniors!

_DISTRACTION_ You definitely contribute quite a lot to Avicus! Cookie Dough.

JeTePardonne New Girl. I'm pretty good at Trombone, I run track, I'm crewhead of my school's theatre's sound crew, I like a lot of stuff :P

replies.body:
{tag=3ec3ad7c563c45fbaedfdd32066a2e19} You're one of the kindest people on Avicus! Winter. I love skiing! I have not played floorball.

{tag=a2fc436888a64ac1880da562d259b684} Another kind person :D Life is great, music is good.

{tag=c27e3c929fb64b009ffc16ed9dc5a5e4} like. Pancakes! Ham.

{tag=6248019ce74a42a4bf4b9cf1c189a72d} You're a fun, nice guy! I enjoy being mod, but I've kind of lost interest in coming on. I wish the staff team had some more enthusiasm and some more professionalism. Ofc I wish we could have more players. You too!

{tag=68cfe240d81c46ae8a939e3eb5d71e3e} Avicade (Red Alert)

{tag=00de9128b5904770aec2e85fb83aaf44} You were a really fun guy albeit a troll sometimes ;) Haven't seen you recently though,
replies.body_tagged:
Sweedie You're one of the kindest people on Avicus! Winter. I love skiing! I have not played floorball.

XGalibur Another kind person :D Life is great, music is good.

kon333 like. Pancakes! Ham.

Myworld6 You're a fun, nice guy! I enjoy being mod, but I've kind of lost interest in coming on. I wish the staff team had some more enthusiasm and some more professionalism. Ofc I wish we could have more players. You too!

Myv Avicade (Red Alert)

OriginaI You were a really fun guy albeit a troll sometimes ;) Haven't seen you recently though,
